description: XXXG-01H Gundam Heavyarms (aka Heavyarms) was the third of Operation Meteor`s five Gundams. Created by Doktor S while hiding in the L3 colony cluster, it was designed with maximum firepower in mind. Literally a walking arsenal, Gundam Heavyarms was piloted by a young man operating under the pseudonym Trowa Barton.
name: XXXG-01H Gundam Heavyarms
